snippet: Lawsuits over copycatting in reality television have gone nowhere in the past, but CBS has suggested to ABC that it may consider one over a summer show called “Glass House.”
abstract: CBS hints that it might consider copyright infringement lawsuit against ABC for its new summer reality television show Glass House, which they say has a similar format to CBS’s long-running series Big Brother.

byline.original: By BILL CARTER; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Lawsuits over copycatting in reality television have gone nowhere in the past, but CBS has suggested to ABC that it may consider one over a summer show called “Glass House.”

headline.main: CBS Threatens ABC Over Reality Show
headline.print_headline: CBS Threatens ABC Over Reality Show
